title: Woke DA Orders Prosecutors To Go Soft On Black Criminals
description:
In this video, I discuss how a leaked memo from far left prosecutor Mary Moriarty shows that her office will now offer better plea terms based on race in order to address disparities in outcomes in the criminal justice system
